div.p: The time series of simulated VM and ENSO indices. ( a) Time series of spring Victoria Mode index for the period 1979–2005 from E 1–3 (blue line) and HadSST (red line). ( b) Same as ( a), but for spring Victoria Mode index from E 4–6 (blue line) and HadSST (red line). ( c) Time series of winter ENSO index for the period 1979–2005 from E 1–3 (blue line) and from the Climate Prediction Center/NOAA (red line). ( d) Same as ( a), but for the winter ENSO index from E 4–6 (blue line) and from the Climate Prediction Center/NOAA (red line). The correlation coefficients ( r) between the two lines are shown in the top right corner and the “*” means r is significant at 95% confidence level. The values in bracket are uncertainty range for the correlation coefficient at the 95% confidence level.
